div.div: Guns in a house in Newtown made it possible for a twenty-year-old to break into a school and lay waste to it in ten minutes. What do we expect guns in the classroom, or in every teacherâ€™s home, to do?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U3d6aC&via=Digg&text=Should Teachers Carry Guns?

div.div: SAY GOODBYE TO THE WHITE MACBOOK

This year, quite a few products disappeared from the market, as technology inevitably marches on. Whether they got pulled for being faulty or just weren't commercially successful, these 10 examples have virtually expired.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RLfaZ7&via=Digg&text=10 Products That Were Discontinued In 2012

div.div: Researchers have found that placebo treatments can stimulate real physiological responses, from changes in heart rate and blood pressure to chemical activity in the brain. So what's behind these real responses to the fake medicine?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12eb1yF&via=Digg&text=Explaining The Placebo Effect

div.a: Sandy Hook Shooting Thrusts â€˜Preppersâ€™ Into Spotlight

div.div: Reports that Nancy Lanza, the Newtown shooter's mom, was a prepper are turning attention towards a nascent movement that has been rapidly entering the popular culture.

div.a: Bridge Closes Due To 'Ice Bombs' Raining Down On Cars

div.div: The cable-stayed bridge just opened to full traffic earlier this month, but on Wednesday it was shut down due to massive chunks of ice falling from the cables and striking vehicles, which sent at least two people to the hospital.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UQQP0q&via=Digg&text=Bridge Closes Due To 'Ice Bombs' Raining Down On Cars

div.div: HER BODY'S TOO BOOTYLICIOUS FOR US

div.a: 1912's Perfect Woman Weighed 171 Lbs, Had Pear-Shaped Body

div.div: One paper declared that she was "taller than Venus de Milo," standing five feet seven inches tall, weighing in "at a healthy 171 pounds, and possessing a decidedly pear-shaped figure (it measured 35-30-40)." Isn't that refreshing?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZmrOAY&via=Digg&text=1912's Perfect Woman Weighed 171 Lbs, Had Pear-Shaped Body

div.a: The Fastest Growing States In America (And Why They're Booming)

div.div: It's not necessarily the unemployment rate that counts when it comes to attracting new residents.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TbpKsT&via=Digg&text=The Fastest Growing States In America (And Why They're Booming)

div.a: Tired Of Nasty YouTube Comments? Download The YuleTube Browser Extension

div.div: There's a browser extension called YuleTube and it works on Safari, Chrome and Firefox. What it does is turn naughty comments into nice ones. With precision and hilarity.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YyMxQP&via=Digg&text=Tired Of Nasty YouTube Comments? Download The YuleTube Browser Extension

div.div: Google is taking its smartphone fate into its own hands, working with Motorola to build its own device known internally as the "X Phone."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VUSvF6&via=Digg&text=Google's Secret iPhone Killer

div.a: Police Dept. To Use Internet To Try To Stop Shootings

div.div: The technique will be similar to those being used to spot terroristsâ€™ chatter online. The new searches would target â€œapolitical or deranged killers before they become active shooters."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Td0TBu&via=Digg&text=Police Dept. To Use Internet To Try To Stop Shootings

div.a: It's Five Times Harder To Get An Attendant Job At Delta Than To Get Into Harvard

div.div: Delta, the worldâ€™s second-largest carrier, received 22,000 applications for about 300 flight attendant jobs in the first week after posting the positions outside the company.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VjF9S3&via=Digg&text=It's Five Times Harder To Get An Attendant Job At Delta Than To Get Into Harvard

div.a: Acting CIA Director Slams 'Zero Dark Thirty'

div.div: "I would not normally comment on a Hollywood film," wrote acting CIA Director Michael Morell in a Friday night press release. "But I think it important to put 'Zero Dark Thirty,' which deals with one of the most significant achievements in our history, into some context."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VWnXmq&via=Digg&text=Acting CIA Director Slams 'Zero Dark Thirty'

div.a: Flickr Is Going Free For Three Months To Entice Instagram Deserters

div.div: The folks at Yahoo! have a nice little gift for you this holiday season: free Pro Flickr for three months for any and all users, old and new. Surely this is just all in the spirit of holiday cheer and has nothing to do with cleverly making use of another image-sharing service's TOS debacle, right?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TKjmpb&via=Digg&text=Flickr Is Going Free For Three Months To Entice Instagram Deserters

div.div: Watching porn online could lead to something more embarrassing than explaining it to your significant otherâ€”your computer might be held hostage.

div.a: Zuckerberg Literally The Voice Behind 'Poke,' Wrote Code Himself

div.div: Mark Zuckerberg invented Poking, one of Facebookâ€™s earliest features, so itâ€™s fitting he was part of the small team that built the new Poke app over the last 12 days.

div.div: NOTHING TO DO WITH GANGNAM STYLE

div.a: The Case Of The 2 Billion Missing Youtube Views

div.div: Youtube released its view counts earlier this week for its biggest channels, and people who watch these things noticed that some major record companies had their numbers drop by a whopping 2 billion views. So, where the heck did they all go?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vcnj7Q&via=Digg&text=The Case Of The 2 Billion Missing Youtube Views

div.a: Can India Scan The Retinas Of 800 Million People In The Next 15 Months?

div.div: Something of a policy revolution is going on in India, as the country works to improve its social services and reduce government waste. And that policy revolution is going to require a whole bunch of scanning.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YrWJdK&via=Digg&text=Can India Scan The Retinas Of 800 Million People In The Next 15 Months?

div.a: New Charging Kiosk Keeps Your Phone Locked Away, But Does It Keep It Safe?

div.div: While Brightboxâ€™s charging kiosk actually provides a useful service for this day and age, the more pressing issue isnâ€™t necessarily where to find the kiosks should you need one, but how safe charging kiosks actually are.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UQLxCb&via=Digg&text=New Charging Kiosk Keeps Your Phone Locked Away, But Does It Keep It Safe?
